content: Other developers should follow suite This game is a winner in all catagories! Great story and the way it is delivered is a experiance to remember with smooth game play and top graffix. Astray is a super star of a game...So give it a play!!!

Awesome game. Interesting story. I did have a problem with the game not recognizing that I had a controller connected though. So I hope that issue gets fixed soon because I was really wanting to play this with a controller. I know it was an issue with this game too because I was able to use my controller with other games but as soon as I tried it with this game several seconds later just didn't work at all, even though it still showed that my controller was still connected to my phone.

So yeah I've been playing the game for a while and I ran to a bunch of problems, one of the most notable ones is the controller feature. For instance I connected the controller and it doesn't work because the game doesn't recognize the controller is connected. And when the game actuay recognizes the controller it does not work on the game, it doesn't want to move or do anything it sucks, but anyway hope you guys can fix it I really like this game. The graphics a really good and the story too.

An absolute masterpiece, great story,gameplay, and JUST enough difficulty for me to be able to figure everything out,the artstyle is great and i can tell that you put loads of work into this game but its is incredibly laggy and i hope you could put in an option to turn down the graphics so that its not as bad
The game is so good, worth the money you pay.
the game wont even work
Give up on lack of updates for the first boss not behaving like It should. Impossible to pass. Waste of money.
Just plain beautiful pixel art and excellent game play
It was super fun and I had an amazing time playing it thank you for this blessingüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèø
I wish there are more options on how controls are layed out.

Ive been really wanting to get this game and just got it today. Sadly i was expecting there to be a on screen game pad for those who dont have a controller and there isnt and you cant get past the start of the first chapter when you just wake up.
It keeps crashing every time i open the app

Cool action-puzzle game with awesome graphics. Touch control is great. ‚ÅâÔ∏è But why the ambient music is mono? sound bad with headphones! You should add a low fps mode. and optimize battery usage. Thx

Great game, definitely worth the money to buy this game but there's a few bug that needed to be fix. First,please fix the bug where the Pause button suddenly dissapear in the middle of the game.The only way to exit out of the game when that bug happens is using the home button,sadly. Second,please fix where we can't see Mo's health bar during boss fights. And third,please optimize the game to use less battery power

Get you act together Google Play Store ,and come out with more pc games!!!Also come out with games like the Apple Store has Hyper Light Drifter!Why is this so hard, and why do you keep the real gamers waiting for games like Diablo Immortal!! I expect more from you guys

This.is an immaculate piece of artwork and a.wonderfully immersive game. My only gripe is controller support. Im on a lg v60 thinQ with the dualscreen and it doesnt connect to the preset controllers. HOWEVER, it is still managable with the customizable control, but feels a little off. Please work on controller support. Other than that, this is honestly one of the main reasons(as well as other rayark games) i havent given up on mobile gaming.
The game is nice and I hope there will be part 2. The controller is nice but during the mech boss fight the controller is uncomfortable cuz it's hard to shoot up and down
BS it doesn't support PS4 CONTROLLER REFUNDED

content: The game is fun and engaging but I'm having trouble connecting using PS4 controller with the game. The device is connected via bluetooth to my Pixel 4a but the game doesn't see it or accept commands from it.
Its a fun game. But I amd having trouble connecting it with my controller. Plz help.

content: Great experience with the game, the graphics are well polished and the narrative is pretty interesting. Only complaint is the music/sound effects. It feels like listening to mono rather than sterio sound effect while playing with headphones.

Currently, hardware controller support is NOT supported for the several pop-up menus at the start (Google Play/Games login, etc) and the main menu. The main menu also doesn't respond to the device's software "back" button (so you have to use the game's version of this instead). Refunded/uninstalled and 1 star until fixed.
replyContent: If there is any abnormal issue, we welcome you to contact us via service@rayark.com. We will help you with it!

content: Graphic and the music is good, please improve the controller. Yes, I know this game has just been released, I'm waiting for future updates, hopefully there is a controller mapping.(I already got the answer from Gmail, so I'm waiting for the next update and will change my review).

content: Just started a few hours ago and so far this game is outstanding, from the graphics to the sound and the gameplay it's excellent. The only issue I found so far is that there's no way to exit the game without using your home button on your phone (at least not that I know of). Nevertheless I'll still give it 5 stars for now.
